title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 319.306 - Spaghetti with meat balls and sauce, spaghetti with meat and sauce, and similar products
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 319.306 - Spaghetti with meat balls and sauce, spaghetti with meat and sauce, and similar products

State Regulations
"Spaghetti and Meat Balls and Sauce" and "Spaghetti
with Meat and Sauce", and similar products shall contain not less than 12
percent of meat computed on the weight of the fresh meat. The presence of the
sauce or gravy constituent shall be declared prominently on the label as part
of the name of the product. Meat balls may be prepared with not more than 12
percent, singly and collectively, of farinaceous material, soy flour, soy
protein concentrate, isolated soy protein, nonfat dry milk, calcium reduced
dried skim milk, and similar substances. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1

319.306

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
